name: comprehensive-review
description: Multi-agent code review orchestration with AI-powered analysis, security auditing, and PR optimization. v1.0.3 features hub-and-spoke architecture with 3 external documentation files, execution modes (quick/standard/deep for reviews, basic/enhanced/enterprise for PR enhancement), YAML frontmatter with time estimates, and streamlined command workflows for maximum efficiency. Comprehensive code quality, security, and PR enhancement capabilities.
